Job Posting:170033 - Position: F25 Intern, Mobile Software Engineer - Team Capital One Travel - Fall 2025 170033B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 06/09/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 05/26/2025 11:41 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Capital One Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Fall F25 Intern, Mobile Software Engineer - Team Capital One Travel - Fall 2025 170033B Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List 161 Bay Street (93021), Canada, Toronto,Toronto, Ontario, Intern, Mobile Software Engineer - Team Capital One Travel - Fall 2025 About Capital One Canada. For over 20 years, we've been on a mission to change banking for good and build relationships by making credit accessible, simple, intuitive and rewarding. We want to help Canadians succeed with credit, because we believe in people - in our customers, in our associates, and in talent like you! About the Team Join the fast-growing Capital One Travel team, as we seek to transform the way customers book travel. Capital One Travel is a fast-moving, highly innovative, digital-first business within Capital One's Premium Products and Experiences organization. We aim to grow an industry leading travel booking platform that customers love and that delivers unique, differentiated benefits to our millions of customers while also powering the headline marketable benefits of our credit card products. As an iOS Software Engineer in Capital One Travel, you'll have the opportunity to be on the forefront of driving a major transformation within Capital One. At Capital One, the iOS and Android platforms are recognized as an opportunity to reach our customers in unique, personal and engaging ways. Our engineers are provided with top of the line Macbook Pros, high-end monitors, and the necessary tooling to develop the best possible products with the least amount of friction. About the Role As an engineer in Capital One Travel, you'll help spearhead the development of mobile features leveraging Swift, Kotlin, and reactive programming to help us build incredible mobile experiences for our customers throughout their travel journey. From shopping and booking their travel to actively helping while in transit, we aim to provide our customers the right information at the right time to make their travel experience as easy as possible. You'll partner with fellow Software Engineers, UX/UI Designers and Product Owners/Analysts to deliver these high performing customer experiences that are engaging, purposeful and powerful in their simplicity. • IDE: XCode, Android Studio, Eclipse • Language:Swift. SwiftUI, Java, Kotlin • Monitoring Tool:NewRelic, Splunk • CI/CD:Jenkins, OnePipeline (Capital One's innersourced CICD pipeline) Your Responsibilities: • Work as part of a dynamic team throughout the software development life cycle, from initial designs to delivery • Develop code to meet acceptance criteria • Conduct design and code reviews to ensure high-level quality output • Ensure adherence to continuous improvement practices as required to meet quality, and time-to-market imperatives • Participate in Agile ceremonies, design and brainstorming sessions • Collaborate with Product and Analyst stakeholders to implement enhancements or new applications • Technical documentation for analysis, test results and release • Learn and build your mobile features on the job • Have fun! Application Details: • If you are a University of Waterloo candidate, please use your WaterlooWorks email address in your application on WorkDay to ensure your application is not lost • Please ensure you attach your work term records, resume, and transcript in the attachment section under Resume/CV when you create your profile to apply on WorkDay Job Requirements Basic Qualifications: • Will obtain a Bachelor's degree or higher from January 2026 or later • Familiarity with mobile application development • Good communication, presentation, and writing skills • Good understanding of testing fundamentals • Able to work within a team setting and actively participate and collaborate in team discussions Preferred Qualifications: • Experience with developing mobile applications • Experience with reactive programming • Experience with version control technology i.e. Git Experience with Jenkins CI/CD, microservices, API design / integration • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: https://www.capitalonecareers.ca/job/toronto/intern-mobile-software-engineer-team-capital-one-travel-fall- 2025/1733/81004599424 Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
